headline: Ventas Finance Leadership Shift And What It Means For Valuation Gap
summary: Ventas (NYSE:VTR) announced the departure of Chief Accounting Officer Gregory R. Liebbe. Chief Financial Officer Robert F. Probst has been appointed interim CAO, consolidating both finance and accounting leadership roles. The company indicated the resignation was not related to disagreements on accounting or financial reporting matters. For investors watching NYSE:VTR, this leadership change is happening while the stock trades at $86.41, with a 30.1% return over the past year and 101.1%...
